cause.description: This bear has been driven mad. He is one of hundreds of bears in Turkey, India and all over Eastern Europe made to dance for public entertainment, and turned insane by the appaling conditions under which they are kept. You can help to set them free. Please send just £3 a month to 'Free The Mad Bears', PO Box 18, London, or call the number below. Together lets set the mad bears free.
cause.mission: Well, you know, free the mad bears.
cause.name: Free The Mad Bears
